Package circeIsland.elements

Class GardenLand

java.lang.Object
circeIsland.elements.Element
circeIsland.elements.GardenLand
public class GardenLand
extends Element
Author:
Emma Yu This class represents Garden Land, which is a type of land that Circe can plant plants on. As time passes, the plants grow and can eventually be harvested. Plants must be watered and will die if its conditions aren't met

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public int getType()
      Returns the type of plant that the GardenLand has
      Returns:

    • plant

      public void plant​(int type)
      Sets the GardenLand type to the planted seed type and initializes relevant variables for plant growth
      Parameters:
      type - Type of plant
      Precondition:
      type must be from 0-4

    • plant

      public void plant​(int type, processing.core.PImage[] images)
      Sets the GardenLand type to the planted seed type and initializes relevant variables for plant growth. Also sets the image field to the given set of images
      Parameters:
      type - Type of plant
      images - Array of GardenLand images
      Precondition:
      type must be from 0-4, images must have length of 4, with each image corresponding to an increasing value of life state

    • water

      public void water()
      Sets the plant's water level to full

    • grow

      public void grow()
      If something is planted on the GardenLand, moves the plant to its next growth stage every 2 days

    • harvest

      public void harvest()
      Sets all plant growth and plant type fields to 0

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface surface, float cellWidth, float cellHeight)
      Description copied from class: Element
      Draws the Element to the given Drawing Surface
      Specified by:
      draw in class Element
      Parameters:
      surface - DrawingSurface on which to draw the Element
      cellWidth - Width of the cell
      cellHeight - Height of the cell

    • act

      public void act()
      Updates how long the plant has been alive for and checks if the plant should be dead. If so, dies. Otherwise, allows the plant to keep growing

    • getLifeState

      public int getLifeState()
      Returns:
      The plant's lifeState field, corresponding from 0-4 depending on what state it is

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Returns:
      Whether or not the plant is alive

    • isMature

      public boolean isMature()
      Returns:
      Whether or not the plant is ready to be harvested

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
